html_code:
Why cookies on the Citigroup website?

This website uses functional cookies to optimize the user experience by adapting to the type of device used and to analyze aggregate web traffic. These cookies, which do not identify individual users, help ensure that the website functions as expected. If you want to learn more, please read our Privacy Notice.
